page.title: 13Typical B&B Accomodation
page.content: Mrs C Smith runs a bed and breakfast business at Ingleston Farm. She gives her guests evening meal, bed and breakfast. She charges per night:- Â£11 for an adult, Â£8.50 for a child 6 to 12 years old, Â£5.50 for a child 2 to 6 years old and nothing for a child under 2 years old. Meals:BREAKFAST - Bacon Egg,Sausage, Tomato,Toast,Fresh Orange Juice,Tea and Coffee. THREE TYPICAL DINNERS - 1. Egg Mayonnaise,Steak and Kidney Pie,Carrots and Potatoes and Chocolate Gateau. 2. Lentil Soup,Fried Steak, Croquet Potatoes,Mushrooms and Cream Caramel. 3. Tomato Soup,Yorkshire Pudding,Peas,Sweetcorn,Roast Beef, Potatoes,Raspberry and Trifle & Cream They have 42 paying guests per year. Usual beverages are Milk,Coffee and Tea and Juice. Vegetables and Eggs are mainly home produced.
